
# This file was generated by the build system used internally in the Yandex monorepo.
# Only simple modifications are allowed (adding source-files to targets, adding simple properties
# like target_include_directories). These modifications will be ported to original
# ya.make files by maintainers. Any complex modifications which can't be ported back to the
# original buildsystem will not be accepted.



add_executable(catboost-libs-metrics-ut)
target_link_libraries(catboost-libs-metrics-ut PUBLIC
  contrib-libs-cxxsupp
  yutil
  cpp-testing-unittest_main
  catboost-libs-metrics
  catboost-libs-helpers
)
target_link_options(catboost-libs-metrics-ut PRIVATE
  -Wl,-platform_version,macos,11.0,11.0
  -fPIC
  -fPIC
)
target_sources(catboost-libs-metrics-ut PRIVATE
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/auc_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/auc_mu_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/brier_score_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/balanced_accuracy_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/dcg_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/err_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/f_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/fair_loss_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/hamming_loss_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/hinge_loss_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/huber_loss_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/kappa_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/llp_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/median_absolute_error_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/mrr_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/msle_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/multiquantile_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/normalized_gini_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/precision_recall_at_k_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/quantile_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/smape_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/stochastic_filter_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/zero_one_loss_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/total_f1_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/tweedie_ut.cpp
  ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/catboost/libs/metrics/ut/pr_auc_ut.cpp
)
set_property(
  TARGET
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  PROPERTY
  SPLIT_FACTOR
  1
)
add_yunittest(
  NAME
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  TEST_TARGET
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  TEST_ARG
  --print-before-suite
  --print-before-test
  --fork-tests
  --print-times
  --show-fails
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  PROPERTY
  LABELS
  MEDIUM
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  PROPERTY
  PROCESSORS
  1
)
set_yunittest_property(
  TEST
  catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  PROPERTY
  ENVIRONMENT
)
target_allocator(catboost-libs-metrics-ut
  system_allocator
)
vcs_info(catboost-libs-metrics-ut)
